title: Welcome Home, Katie Gallagher
description: Nobody said a fresh start would be easy A clean slate is exactly what Katie Gallagher needs, and Bar Harbor, Maine, is the best place to get it. Except the cottage her grandmother left her is overrun with woodland creatures, and the police chief, Aiden Cavanaugh, seems determined to arrest her! Katie had no idea she'd broken his heart fifteen years ago… "Kelly's debut book is smart, sexy, and so much fun. I couldn't put it down." -Laurie Benson, author of the Secret Lives of the Ton series
author: Seana Kelly
